title: Topic 001 Question 272
body: When using Terraform to deploy resources into Azure, which scenarios are true regarding state files? (Choose two.)
options: When you change a Terraform-managed resource via the Azure Cloud Console, Terraform updates the state file to reflect the change during the next plan or apply
Changing resources via the Azure Cloud Console records the change in the current state file
When you change a resource via the Azure Cloud Console, Terraform records the changes in a new state file
Changing resources via the Azure Cloud Console does not update current state file
